Author: mdemare
Content: Actually it doesn't work - calling the returned lambda should increment n - your implementation doesn't.

Author: LPTS
Content: An ametuer works when inspired, a professional works whether or not they feel inspired.

Author: nostrademons
Content: If you've seen any interviews with Max Levchin, it's clear that startups are a profession for him. "An entrepreneur is someone who desperately wants to start companies. He or she doesn't even care what they are about, or which one," he said at a talk at UIUC. PayPal was his 5th startup, and I imagine there will be many more.
